mapper.select: select a.data_src_code sourceTableCode, a.data_src_tab_name sourceTableName, a.table_data_cycle dataCycle, max(b.data_source_time) dataDate from dim_coc_index_table_info a left join dim_coc_data_source_status b on a.data_src_code=b.data_source_id where a.data_src_code=#{sourceTableCode} group by a.data_src_code,a.data_src_tab_name,a.table_data_cycle

SELECT data_src_tab_name FROM dim_coc_index_table_info WHERE 1=1
and table_data_cycle = #{dataCycle}
SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT 1 FROM ${tabname} FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY)

SELECT count(*) FROM dim_coc_index_table_info WHERE 1=1
and table_data_cycle = #{dataCycle}
SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT 1 FROM syscat.tables WHERE tabName=#{tabName} FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY )
